DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this cross-sectional study is to obtain insight in the characteristics (nutritional status and level of physical activity) of sarcopenic compared to non-sarcopenic community-dwelling older people. There is one measurement moment and measurements will take place at the participant's home.
DOC.detailed_description: - Characterization of sarcopenic older people (demographics, nutritional status, level of physical activity) - Prevalence rates of sarcopenia in community-dwelling older people in the Netherlands - Insight in differences and/or overlap between sarcopenia versus frailty - Insight in the impact of sarcopenia on economic outcomes
